channel.title: [Tekkit Lite] EvolutionServers [24/7][PVE][40 Slot][MCBans][No Whitelist]
channel.description:
[ul][list][CENTER][IMG]http://www.evoservers.net/smf/Themes/twotone_20/images/custom/logo.png[/img]
[COLOR=#454545][URL=http://'http://minecraftviewer.com/servers/2148705/view'][IMG]http://cache.multiplayuk.com/b/1-2148705-560x95-1-FF5519-FFFFFF.png[/img][/URL][/COLOR] Server is always [U][B]Online[/B][/U]. Above status can be false at times..[/CENTER]
[CENTER]EvoServers tries to provide a high quality gaming experience for all players. We aim to be a family friendly community that is open to all ages. If you are will to join our community you [U][B]must[/B][/U] respect everyone in it. There will be no fighting, stealing, cheating, or griefing. If you are caught doing so you will be banned. Remember to claim your land, you always start with a gold shovel(; . Please do not build anything obscene or ugly. Basic teleport commands are available, and no "special" donations required for certain items! Everything is free![/CENTER]
[B][U]Key Plugins:[/U][/B] [list] [*]Grief-prevention [*]Essentials [*]Pex [*]Core Protect [*]MCBans [*]Tekkit Customizer [*]WorldGuard [/list] [LEFT][B][U]Administrators:[/U][/B][/LEFT] [*]Tristan_is_cool [*]Matt_is_cool [*]2_Cookies [/list] [B][U]Moderators:[/U][/B] [*]Frosted_Angel [*]N/A [*]N/A[/ul]
[B][U]Banned Items:[/U][/B]
[ul][*]TNT [*]Industrial TNT [*]Dynamite [*]Sticky Dynamite [*]Nukes [*]Power Armor [*]Anchors [*]Mining Lazer [*]Cannons [*]Force Fields [*]Turtle Turtle [*]Battle Axes[/ul]
[B][U]Rules:[/U][/B]
[ul][*]No spamming chat. [*]No stealing [*]No retarded 1x100 towers [*]Show respect to others [*]Keep swearing to a minimum [*]No griefing [*]No hacking [*]Don't destroy other peoples work.[/ul]
[B][U]Basic Commands:[/U][/B]
[ul][*]/spawn [*]/home [*]/sethome [*]/tpa [*]/mail [*]/me [*]/help[/ul]
[U][B]Server Specs:[/B][/U]
[ul][*]Dual Core 3.50Ghz Processor [*]6.02GB RAM [*]150GB SSD [*]100Mbps connection[/ul]
[FONT=Arial Black]*MUST USE TEKKIT LAUNCHER W/ TEKKIT LITE MOD PACK

[CENTER]EvoServers tries to provide a high quality gaming experience for all players. We aim to be
